content: --घट्टः, --घट्टकः [अरैः घट्ट्यते रच्यते असौ] {1} a wheel or machine for raising water from a well (<ab>Mar.</ab> राहाट). (It usually consists of a single wheel with spokes on each side serving as handles to turn it, and a rope with a bucket attached to it passes over this wheel); °दृं खेलयमानः <ls>Pt. 4</ls> turning this machine;
